interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  150  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Tsuneyo Tojo, Stand-up Comedian " Seen " Apples to Apples " from Yumi Yamaguchi Seen " Nothing Was Missing, Except Me " from Rin Rokuhara Seen " Nightvision " from Miku Maruyama
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first day on or after Day 150.

progression.synopsis: Today is the day that Sensei receives his second transfer student. As he is about to walk into class, Yumi apologizes for "freaking out" on him at the ramen store . Yumi isn't in class often enough to have met Molly yet, and baffled by her when she does. Shortly after, Sensei meets his new yet familiar transfer student. She asks for help in making a good impression on the class, and he tells her to just be herself.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.7.
